data.title: ITS 1996
data.text:
3. ITS 1996: Montrél, Canada

Claude Frasson, Gilles Gauthier, Alan M. Lesgold (Eds.): Intelligent Tutoring Systems, Third International Conference, ITS '96, Montréal, Canada, June 12-14, 1996, Proceedings. Lecture Notes in Computer Science 1086 Springer 1996, ISBN 3-540-61327-7 BibTeX
